alert.note: Alert for Lucas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 1:26PM EDT until August 12 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lucas County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 126 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Temperance, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Toledo, Oregon, Sylvania, Ottawa Hills, Harbor View, Reno Beach and Bono. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northwestern Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northwestern Ohio.
